attributes.action: The Resignation of Prime Minister Theresa May in light of Windrush
attributes.additional_details: Documented recently all over the news and latest cover up on demanding MPs in her government not to disclose documents that will shed light on her cover up and deliberate intentions on targeting wind rush to get immigration down.
attributes.background: Theresa May and her government have continually covered up to hide the policy they ran to deport legal British Citizens of the Caribbean who were invited to England to help rebuild this great country.  She has not been transparent in her dealings.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
